title: After years of having this and not using it, how do I get actual help. Hasn’t worked at all in the past.

title: Recent download of mozzilla Firefox on laptop causes computer to not restart
content:
About an hour ago I logged onto our Alienware laptop and was prompted to update Firefox.

There was a message after I installed that if the system said there was a lack 9f compatibility w Microsoft to install anyway.

This concerned me so I did a system restore.

Now the computer keeps having errors on start up.

It gives us the option to do a start up repair.

https://www.google.com/amp/s/techcrunch.com/2020/01/10/firefox-security-bug-zero-day/amp/

I read this article.

Is it accurate?
creator: bonniejeanvolkman327

title: Firefox bookmarking problem
content:
When I go to bookmark a web site, as I start to type the bookmark folder name it vanishes. 

I have to go into the bookmarks folder, find the no name folder and type in the new folder name.

As I start typing I have to enter the first letter twice as first strike does not work.

I have thousands of bookmarks which are set up in a Book, Chapter, Paragraph, Sentence format. So when a new folder goes missing it is easy to find the unnamed or a folder with no name. Thank you for the help.
creator: Bonnermartin1

title: network.trr.mode 3 keeps changing back to 2 which I have to manually change back
content:
Hi Everyone,

network.trr.mode = 3 keeps reverting back to 2 after a while. I have to manually check and change the value back to 3, it could be after a few minutes or a few hours before the value reverts back to 2. How can I permanently set the value to 3? I am using Firefox 96.0.3, I have seen multiple posts about this issue with no solution from 2019 onwards. Is this a bug?

I am have multiple Firefox browsers 96.0.3 and this is occurring in each of them, which is really a hassle having to change each of them.
creator: fxybrew
